text: Jerry Faye Hall (born July 2, 1956 in Gonzales, Texas) is an American actress and model. She appeared in several movies., the most notable being Batman (1989). In November 1990, she married Mick Jagger. They had four children. The couple divorced in 1999. Hall has appeared on many magazine covers during her fashion modeling career. In 2016, she married Rupert Murdoch. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Actors from Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Models from Texas Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Jerry Hall
